key_findings.interpretation: Each unit increase in enrollment_rate is associated with 35.5% higher odds of literacy
Each unit increase in pupil_teacher_ratio is associated with 12.8% lower odds of literacy
Each unit increase in teacher_qualification_rate is associated with 21.1% higher odds of literacy
Each unit increase in household_poverty_rate is associated with 22.3% lower odds of literacy
Each unit increase in mother_education_years is associated with 34.8% higher odds of literacy
Each unit increase in household_size is associated with 6.4% lower odds of literacy
Each unit increase in internet_access_rate is associated with 23.0% higher odds of literacy
Each unit increase in textbook_availability_index is associated with 36.6% higher odds of literacy
Each unit increase in travel_time_to_school_min is associated with 16.1% lower odds of literacy
Each unit increase in electricity_access_rate is associated with 21.3% higher odds of literacy
